name: fullstackopen-part3
description: Part 3 of online course Full Stack Open

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../FullStackOpen/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../FullStackOpen-Part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "build: deploy app" && git push && npm run deploy

author: Ossian Rajala
